name: MotivationalAbstract
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: motivational abstract
des: In this fast-growing competitive world, one of the biggest problem faced by people is depression. To motivate them, this skill will give them some motivational thoughts/abstracts. I have used Python3 for backend. The skill gives the response randomly. To achieve this feat, 'random' was imported. The skill randomly choose one of the index, and gives the response. By doing so it is made sure that, the probability of getting same motivating thoughts reduces.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
